Title: Beautiful Girl
Writer: Dominik Hartel, Claudia Kolland (dramatisation), Agnes Pluch
Actors: Jana McKinnon, Marlon Boess, Giacomo Pilotti, Christian Dungl
Plot: Fifteen-year-old Charlotte thinks her parents' relationship is perfect. It's all the more surprising for her when they get separated. Her parents' separation is her first lesson in life on ...
